text: [[img:bullet_emp_magic]][[/img]]The Kitchen: Use your Lords to forage for ingredients and cook food recipes to boost your Halfling armies!||[[img:bullet_emp_offices]][[/img]]Halfling Restaurants: Establish lucrative restaurants in foreign settlements using Master Chefs, or by gifting regions to the Empire.||[[img:bullet_emp_units]][[/img]]Quirky and nimble Halfling units make up the majority of this roster, along with added culinary artillery, and monstruous infantry support from Imperial Ogres.
